verse:
नित्योऽनित्यानां चेतनश्चेतनानामेको बहूनां यो विदधाति कामान्‌।
तमात्मस्थं येऽनुपश्यन्ति धीरास्तेषां शान्तिः शाश्वती नेतरेषाम्‌ ॥
meaning: नित्योऽनित्यानां चेतनश्चेतनानाम्: The eternal among the temporary, the conscious among the conscious,एको बहूनां यो विदधाति कामान्: The One who sustains the desires of many,तमात्मस्थं येऽनुपश्यन्ति धीराः: Those wise individuals who perceive that Eternal Being present within oneself,तेषां शान्तिः शाश्वती नेतरेषाम्‌:For them, there is eternal peace, unlike others.Meaning:This verse highlights the concept of the eternal consciousness that exists amidst the temporary manifestations of consciousness. It emphasizes that there is one eternal being who fulfills the desires of all living beings. The wise individuals who have the ability to perceive this eternal being within themselves are able to attain everlasting peace, unlike others who remain oblivious to it.

upanishad-org.meaning: The One Eternal in many transient, the One Conscious in many conscious beings, who being One ordereth the desires of many; the calm and strong who behold Him in the self as in a mirror, theirs is eternal peace and ‘tis not for others.[p.122]
